title.rendered: Fantasy Cricket Tips for Mumbai vs Bangalore, India Women’s League 2023

content.rendered:
We have opted for a fantasy cricket team based on the recent performances, overall impact, and credit points.

Probable XIs

Mumbai: Hayley Matthews, Yastika Bhatia (wk), Nat Sciver-Brunt, Harmanpreet Kaur (c), Amelia Kerr, Issy Wong, Amanjot Kaur, Pooja Vastrakar, Humaira Kazi, Jintimani Kalita, Saika Ishaque

Bangalore: Sophie Devine, Smriti Mandhana (c), Ellyse Perry, Heather Knight, Richa Ghosh (wk), Kanika Ahuja, Shreyanka Patil, Disha Kasat, Megan Schutt, Asha Shobana, Preeti Bose

Pitch Report

Venue: Dr DY Patil Sports Academy, Navi Mumbai

(Based on the last three games)

1st innings average score: 124

2nd innings average score: 176

Wickets per innings: 6

Type: Good for batting

Wins

Batting 1st: —

Batting 2nd: 100%

Also Read:

India vs Australia, 3rd ODI: Fantasy Tips

Fantasy Tips of The Day

Hayley Matthews has scored three thirties, scalped five wickets, and pouched two catches in four matches at the venue, rewarding fantasy players in every possible way.

Five of Issy Wong’s six wickets in the tournament have come in Navi Mumbai. In addition, she has provided handy points with the bat, registering scores of 23, 32, and 6*.

Harmanpreet Kaur has been a great fantasy prospect at the venue, making it to the Best11 in all games.

The only time Ellyse Perry picked up wickets in the tournament was at this venue. However, she has been excellent with the bat, scoring two fifties and two thirties.

Sobhana Asha had identical figures — two for 27 — in both games at the venue.

Sophie Devine and Ellyse are the only players from both teams to feature in the Best11 in each of the last five games.

Richa Ghosh generated the 30-run bonus in both games she played at the venue, while also grabbing four catches.

Matthews (three wickets and 77* runs) and Nat Sciver-Brunt (55* and one wicket) were the captain and vice-captain of the Best11 when the sides clashed earlier.

Saika Ishaque has gone wicketless in the last three matches. However, she provided bonus points for an economy of under 6 RPO twice.
